capReached().return: bool Whether the cap was reached

params._allowBeneficialInvestments: Boolean to allow or disallow beneficial investments

params._cap: Maximum No. of token base units for sale
params._endTime: Unix timestamp at which offering get ended
params._fundRaiseTypes: Type of currency used to collect the funds
params._fundsReceiver: Ethereum account address to hold the funds
params._rate: Token units a buyer gets multiplied by 10^18 per wei / base unit of POLY
params._startTime: Unix timestamp at which offering get started

getSTODetails().return: Unixtimestamp at which offering gets start.Unixtimestamp at which offering ends.Number of token base units this STO will be allowed to sell to investors.Token units a buyer gets(multiplied by 10^18) per wei / base unit of POLYAmount of funds raisedNumber of individual investors this STO have.Amount of tokens get sold.Boolean value to justify whether the fund raise type is POLY or not, i.e true for POLY.
